articles.description: It is uncanny how human fears about robots mirror those about immigrants. But maybe they aren't out to take our jobs or destroy us all, says Annalee Newitz

articles.title: Spellbinding debut book explores the marvels of our brains

articles.title: Independent estimate of Gaza deaths is higher than official figures
articles.description: A study based on household surveys suggests that from October 2023 to January 2025, around 75,000 people in Gaza died violent deaths, while Gaza's health ministry estimates 46,000 for the same period

articles.title: Gastric bypass surgery may cut the risk of bowel cancer
articles.description: Weight-loss surgery seems to lower the risk of colorectal cancer by changing where bile acids enter the small intestine, raising the possibility of developing treatments that mimic these effects
